entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `first_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `last_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `phone` TEXT NOT NULL, `email` TEXT NOT NULL, `date_of_birth` INTEGER, `salary` REAL NOT NULL, `note` TEXT NOT NULL, `photo_uri` TEXT, `isFavorite` INTEGER NOT NULL)
CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`first_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `last_name` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`applicant`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_applicant_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `applicant` BEGIN DELETE FROM `applicant_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_applicant_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `applicant` BEGIN DELETE FROM `applicant_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_applicant_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `applicant` BEGIN INSERT INTO `applicant_fts`(`docid`, `first_name`, `last_name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`first_name`, NEW.`last_name`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_applicant_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `applicant` BEGIN INSERT INTO `applicant_fts`(`docid`, `first_name`, `last_name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`first_name`, NEW.`last_name`); END

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, 'e07ab6a66590a45950b5b1e638703362')
